content: Hi Folks. Announcing an early version of a create-react craftool template to get you up and running with a confidential FHIR app. We will be adding example support for authentication of SMART and CDS Hooks launch sequences in the near future. https://github.com/Vermonster/fhir-kit-create-react . Have fun, feedback welcome!
Can you update the wiki page with your open source project details? http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Open_Source_FHIR_implementations
Sure thing @John Moehrke . I've requested access to the wiki.
